name: Daily Unfairness
description:
Hello, here is our first little game made in the context of an "Out of Range" exercise for a school project with a 5 month timeline. It is based on some annoying moments of the day.  

Instruction : Only mouse needed  

Team : 

Kevin Munschi 

Tristan Mingeat

Kilyan Fernandez 

Etoré Giorgiutti 

Charles de Launay du Couëdic de Kergoualer  

Boney M. - Rasputin, Caramella Girls - Caramelldansen, The Andy Griffith Theme, Cowboy Bebop: "Cats on Mars" for Piano, Dragonforce - Through The Fire and Flames Instrumental Remix "used according to the Fair Use"

Good game to you
